A

ApiCodeSupplier - Class in org.jmel.mastermind.core.secretcodesupplier
A code supplier implementation that uses the random.org API to generate a random code of a given length where each code element is one of the allowed colors.

HIGHER_LOWER - Enum constant in enum class org.jmel.mastermind.core.feedbackstrategy.FeedbackStrategyImpl
A feedback strategy that provides higher, lower, or equal information for each position in the guess.
HigherLowerFeedback - Record Class in org.jmel.mastermind.core.feedbackstrategy
An implementation of the Feedback interface that provides a List<Integer> of ones, zeros, and negative ones, where: 1 means that the guess element was higher than, 0 means that the guess element was equal to, and -1 means that the guess element was lower than, the corresponding secret code element.
HigherLowerFeedback(List<Integer>) - Constructor for record class org.jmel.mastermind.core.feedbackstrategy.HigherLowerFeedback
Constructs a new HigherLowerFeedback object with the given values by creating an immutable list of the values.

L

LocalRandomCodeSupplier - Class in org.jmel.mastermind.core.secretcodesupplier
A code supplier that uses java.util.Random to generate a random code of a given length and specified colors.
